sourcesContent:
Contact detail

import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, Inject, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { Category, Contact, Subcategory } from '../contact'; @Component({ selector: 'app-contact-detail', templateUrl: './contact-detail.component.html', styleUrls: ['./contact-detail.component.css'] }) export class ContactDetailComponent implements OnInit { contact!: Contact; categories: Category[] = []; subcategories: Subcategory[] = []; constructor(public http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') public baseUrl: string, private route: ActivatedRoute) { } ngOnInit(): void { let id = this.route.snapshot.paramMap.get('id'); this.http.get(this.baseUrl + 'contact/category').subscribe(result => { this.categories = result; }, error => console.error(error)); this.http.get((this.baseUrl + 'contact/'+id)).subscribe(result => { this.contact = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } onPost() { } }
